entry.title: How to colossally fuck shit up
entry.summary:
Author: Cashewchococake

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 23,078Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 73

Summary: Derek is brought back to life by our favorite FBI-agent, Stiles Stilinski.They have sex and Derek gets pregnant.A story about Derek and Stiles building their family and trying to find their way to each other.orStiles was looking at him expectedly.Derek took a deep breath and prepared himself for the upcoming words. “But I wasn’t the only one he smelled like, Stiles.”He looked pleadingly at Stiles, who'd gone deathly pale, and was now shaking his head.“Stiles-, Eli is your son.” Derek forced out.Stiles let out a small breathless sound of “Oh!”He shot up from the couch and took his head between his hands, pulling his hair.When that didn’t help to quiet the raging flood of questions in his head, he started pacing.“What? -I mean…how? How is that even possible?""Why the hell would you keep that from me?” He was spluttering.Stiles couldn’t believe what he was hearing. Why would Derek do that?

entry.title: Pack Scent
entry.summary:
Author: theauthoress

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,567Chapters: 1/6Kudos: 51

Summary: “What’s going on?”Scott made a strange, whiny noise at the back of his throat that made him sound a little like a kicked puppy. “Your scent.” He pulled on Stiles’s hoodie until their noses were practically touching.“Scott, buddy, you’re going to have to be more specific.” Stiles rubbed a circle on the back of Scott’s hand with his thumb. “You know I don’t have werewolf senses.”“You smell like… like…” Scott fumbled for words, his brow furrowed deeply. His eyes started to look a little wet, and that was something Stiles could not deal with.“Hey, hey, it’s okay. I’m okay. Just tell me what’s wrong and we’ll fix it. I’ll—I dunno—shower really good, I promise.”“You smell like something claimed you,” Scott finally said in a horrified whisper.

entry.title: symphonic devotion
entry.summary:
Author: hansuckss

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,270Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 6

Summary: “When fate is messed with, it punishes those who messes with the flow of time and rewards those who were affected.”  After taking his own life in a bathtub, Derek Hale wakes up as a ghost trapped in a strange, distorted version of his neighborhood—alongside another ghost named ‘Stiles’. Neither remembers anything about their past, but they're inexplicably tied to one another. All they have to guide them are an old piano and two eerily familiar houses.Or; two memory-less spirits search for answers about who they were, why they're connected, and what this so-called “happy ending” is all about—only to discover comfort and companionship in each other along the way. - as seen on wattpad -

entry.title: Scar Tissue
entry.summary:
Author: Halevetica

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 34,184Chapters: 28/55Kudos: 341

Summary: Derek hasn't worked with a partner in years, it's easier to keep his secret if he's alone. However, a new case against a family he's been wanting to take down falls into his lap, only it comes with a catch, he must accept a new partner. He doesn't know if he can work with someone again. But he's desperate to take down the family that took everything from him. All he has to do is keep his new partner in the dark. But what if his new partner has a secret of his own?

entry.title: Fingers Crossed
entry.summary:
Author: UnknownXFuture

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 356,356Chapters: 31/40Kudos: 892

Summary: “Have you ever heard of the butterfly effect?”He looked up and shook his head. “No… what is it?”“It’s the idea that the smallest of situations, can set the biggest consequences in motion. A butterfly flapping it’s wings on one side of the world, creates a hurricane on the other.”He nodded, that’s exactly how this situation sounds right now. If he and Scott never went out that fateful night and looked for that body, or if he and Derek never became friends, or hell, if he never agreed to Deatons plan in the first place… then none of this would be happening.But fuck it, ‘caution’ isn’t in his vocabulary.~~~UPDATES BIWEEKLY <3

entry.title: Designation 19621
entry.summary:
Author: fanficreader5

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,023Chapters: 5/19Kudos: 172

Summary: “My designation is 19621, sir.”   Stiles stares at him.   “That's quite the mouthful. Any chance you have a, like, normal name?”   “Derek,” the cleaner says eventually. He looks at the red button on the wall and then glances away.  Stiles follows his gaze and blanches. “Dude, I’m not gonna shock you for telling me your name.”_____The new werewolf cleaner for Stiles' PhD group is grumpy and aloof and maybe a genius. As Stiles gets to know him, he can't help but wonder if there's any way to get that collar off him.

entry.title: No Graves for the Forgotten
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,216Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 7

Summary: No one is safe in the shadows—especially when the shadows remember.The world that remains is a graveyard with golden gates, ruled by the Argents, whose empire was built not on glory, but on silence, ash, and the bones of those who dared to dream. Derek Hale leads what’s left of the rebellion, his hands calloused by grief, his heart stitched together by war. He knows how power corrupts. He knows how mercy dies.But nothing has prepared him for the ghost wearing a human face.Stiles Stilinski.A name with no roots. A smile with too many meanings.He moves like a rumor — seen only when he chooses to be,his voice a blade wrapped in velvet,his eyes a storm no one can read.He speaks in riddles. He disappears like breath in winter.And he carries something ancient — something the world tried to forget.Derek doesn’t know if Stiles is a prophecy in disguise,or a ruin waiting to bloom.But as secrets surface like corpses beneath still water,a cruel truth rises with them:The crown may be made of iron,but it is the whisper at your side that will cut deepest.
